snippet: Boeing was a standout as the Standard & Poor’s 500 rose for an eighth straight day, its longest streak of gains since January.
abstract: Citigroup’s solid earnings help push Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index higher for eighth consecutive day, longest such streak since mid-January 2013, although weak retail sales curbs advance.
lead_paragraph: Boeing was a standout as the Standard & Poor’s 500 rose for an eighth straight day, its longest streak of gains since January.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Earnings Help S.&P. Rise for an 8th Day
headline.print_headline: Citigroup’s Earnings Help S.&P. Rise for an 8th Day
